game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.synopsis: In a world where magic has disappeared, the land is dying and the people are suffering. You play as Eira, a young apprentice mage who seeks to uncover the secrets behind the loss of magic and restore it to the world. Your journey takes you across treacherous landscapes, through ancient ruins, and into the heart of darkness itself.
game.beginning: You begin in the small village of Brindlemark, where Eira lives with her mentor, a powerful mage named Thorold. The village is plagued by a mysterious affliction that has caused the crops to wither and die. Thorold sends you on a quest to gather information about the loss of magic.
game.ending: After overcoming countless challenges and battling fearsome foes, you finally reach the heart of darkness: an ancient temple where the source of magic lies. There, you discover that magic was not lost, but stolen by a powerful being known only as "The Devourer." With this knowledge, you set out to reclaim the stolen magic and restore it to the world.
